thread.title: PAULINE and thanks for your order
thread.title_full: Castlegatelights reviewed by PAULINE and thanks for your order

author: PAULINE and thanks for your order
title: PAULINE and thanks for your order
text: This was my second purchase from this company. Prices were good and delivering was quick. We were kept informed and given a one hour time slot on day of delivery. Would highly recommend.
